XmlWorldData.name: Maze Tutorial 3
XmlWorldData.description: Kodu Maze Tutorial, part 3, created for the 2014 Hour of Code. Visit https://www.youtube.com/user/KoduTeam for a video walk-through of this tutorial.

value.string: Программирование лабиринта, часть 3, создано для Hour of Code 2014. Посмотри видео по уроку https://www.youtube.com/user/KoduTeam.

XmlWorldData.creator: KoduTeam

Step.GamepadText:
Welcome to Maze Tutorial 3!
This time Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> is lost, hungry, AND SURROUNDED BY ENEMIES!
Look in the maze for 6 <filter.fruit> Watch out for <filter.terracannon> and their missiles <modifier.projectile.missile>! Keep an eye out for patrolling<filter.saucer>! Find Bro-du and lead him <filter.hut>!
Step.MouseText:
Welcome to Maze Tutorial 3!
This time Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> is lost, hungry, AND SURROUNDED BY ENEMIES!
Look in the maze for 6 <filter.fruit> Watch out for <filter.terracannon> and their missiles <modifier.projectile.missile>! Keep an eye out for patrolling <filter.saucer>! Find Bro-du and lead him <filter.hut>!

value.string:
Добро пожаловать в 3 урок по программированию лабиринта!
Сейчас Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> потерян, голоден, И ОКРУЖЕН ВРАГАМИ!
Найди в лабиринте 6 <filter.fruit> Остерегайся <filter.terracannon> и их снарядов <modifier.projectile.missile>! Следи за патрулированием <filter.saucer>! Найди Bro-du и отведи его к <filter.hut>!

Step.TouchText:
Welcome to Maze Tutorial 3!
This time Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> is lost, hungry, AND SURROUNDED BY ENEMIES! Look in the maze for 6 <filter.fruit> Watch out for <filter.terracannon> and their missiles <modifier.projectile.missile>! Keep an eye out for patrolling <filter.saucer>! Find Bro-du and lead him <filter.hut>!

Step.Comment: Statement 1 What we'll be doing text
Step.GamepadText:
Before we rescue Bro-du we're going to make the maze more challenging.
To do that we will: (1) Move 3 <filter.fruit> into the Maze! (2) Edit Bro-du's<filter.blue><kodu> code to follow Kodu once 6 points have been <sensor.scored>. (3) Fix the <filter.terracannon> <filter.red> to fire missiles <modifier.projectile.missile> (4) Fix the <filter.saucer> <filter.red>to<actuator.damage> the <filter.white><kodu> for <filter.003points> when they <sensor.bumpers>
Let's get going!
Step.MouseText:
Before we rescue Bro-du we're going to make the maze more challenging.
To do that we will: (1) Move 3 <filter.fruit> into the Maze! (2) Edit Bro-du's<filter.blue><kodu> code to follow Kodu once 6 points have been <sensor.scored>. (3) Fix the <filter.terracannon> <filter.red> to fire missiles <modifier.projectile.missile> (4) Fix the <filter.saucer> <filter.red>to<actuator.damage> the <filter.white><kodu> for <filter.003points> when they <sensor.bumpers>
Let's get going!

value.string:
Прежде, чем спасать Bro-du, сделай прохождение лабиринта более сложным. Для этого: 1) Передвинь 3 <filter.fruit> в лабиринт! 2) Отредактируй программу Bro-du <filter.blue><kodu>, чтобы он начинал идти за Kodu, только если набрано 6 очков <sensor.scored>. 3) Исправь ошибки, чтобы <filter.terracannon> <filter.red> стреляла <modifier.projectile.missile>. 4) Исправь ошибки, чтобы <filter.saucer> <filter.red> приносила <actuator.damage> Kodu <filter.white><kodu> в <filter.003points> при <sensor.bumpers>.
Начинай!

Step.TouchText:
Before we rescue Bro-du we're going to make the maze more challenging.
To do that we will: (1) Move 3 <filter.fruit> into the Maze! (2) Edit Bro-du's<filter.blue><kodu> code to follow Kodu once 6 points have been <sensor.scored>. (3) Fix the <filter.terracannon> <filter.red> to fire missiles <modifier.projectile.missile> (4) Fix the <filter.saucer> <filter.red>to<actuator.damage> the <filter.white><kodu> for <filter.003points> when they <sensor.bumpers>
Let's get going!

Step.GamepadText: There are 3 new <filter.fruit>on the ground near the path.
Step.MouseText: There are 3 new <filter.fruit>on the ground near the path.

value.string: 3 новых <filter.fruit>уже добавлены на входе в лабиринт рядом с дорожкой.

Step.TouchText: There are 3 new <filter.fruit>on the ground near the path.

Step.GamepadText: Press A while selecting the <filter.fruit> and use the left joystick to move it anywhere in the maze!
Step.MouseText: Click and drag the <filter.fruit>anywhere in the maze!
Step.TouchText: Tap and drag the <filter.fruit>anywhere in the maze!

Step.GamepadText: When your Maze is ready, open up the programming options for Bro-du.
Step.MouseText: When your Maze is ready, open up the programming options for Bro-du.

value.string: Когда лабиринт будет готов, открой программу Bro-du.

Step.TouchText: When your Maze is ready, open up the programming options for Bro-du.

Step.GamepadText:
Now that you're in Bro-du's<filter.blue><kodu> program options look at the first row. Together we will change his code to need 6<filter.fruit>
from WHEN <sensor.scored><modifier.003points><modifier.scorebucket.color.white> to WHEN <sensor.scored><modifier.005points><modifier.001point><modifier.scorebucket.color.white>
Step.MouseText:
Now that you're in Bro-du's<filter.blue><kodu> program options look at the first row. Together we will change his code to need 6<filter.fruit>
from WHEN <sensor.scored><modifier.003points><modifier.scorebucket.color.white> to WHEN <sensor.scored><modifier.005points><modifier.001point><modifier.scorebucket.color.white>

value.string:
Теперь ты в программе Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu>. Посмотри на 1 строчку. Давай изменим код, чтобы требовалось собрать 6<filter.fruit>
Замени КОГДА <sensor.scored><modifier.scorebucket.color.white><filter.scoreequals><modifier.003points> на КОГДА <sensor.scored><modifier.scorebucket.color.white><filter.scoreequals><modifier.005points><modifier.001point>

Step.TouchText:
Now that you're in Bro-du's<filter.blue><kodu> program options look at the first row. Together we will change his code to need 6<filter.fruit>:
from WHEN <sensor.scored><modifier.003points><modifier.scorebucket.color.white> to WHEN <sensor.scored><modifier.005points><modifier.001point><modifier.scorebucket.color.white>

Step.GamepadText: There is no 6 points tile so we will make 6 by adding <modifier.005points> and <modifier.001point> tiles. Let's start by changing the <modifier.003points> into <modifier.005points>
Step.MouseText: There is no 6 points tile so we will make 6 by adding <modifier.005points> and <modifier.001point> tiles. Let's start by changing the <modifier.003points> into <modifier.005points>

value.string: В списке нет карточки 6 баллов, поэтому получим 6 баллов, добавив <modifier.005points> и <modifier.001point>. Сначала поменяй <modifier.003points> на <modifier.005points>

Step.TouchText: There is no 6 points tile so we will make 6 by adding <modifier.005points> and <modifier.001point> tiles. Let's start by changing the <modifier.003points> into <modifier.005points>

Step.GamepadText: Next lets change <filter.scorebucket.color.white> into <modifier.001point> to make a total of 6 points, 1 for each <filter.fruit>. It should look like WHEN <sensor.scored><modifier.005points><modifier.001point>
Step.MouseText: Next lets change <filter.scorebucket.color.white> into <modifier.001point> to make a total of 6 points, 1 for each <filter.fruit>. It should look like WHEN <sensor.scored><modifier.005points><modifier.001point>

value.string: Затем добавь еще 1 балл, чтобы получить в сумме 6 баллов, по одному за каждое <filter.fruit>. Должно получиться так: КОГДА <sensor.scored><modifier.scorebucket.color.white><modifier.005points><modifier.001point>

Step.TouchText: Next lets change <filter.scorebucket.color.white> into <modifier.001point> to make a total of 6 points, 1 for each <filter.fruit>. It should look like WHEN <sensor.scored><modifier.005points><modifier.001point>

Step.GamepadText: Press A when selecting the plus sign next to the <modifier.001point>, then click on scores, then <modifier.scorebucket.color.white> You can find <modifier.scorebucket.color.white> in <group.scorebucketmodifiers> It should look like WHEN <sensor.scored><modifier.005points><modifier.001point><modifier.scorebucket.color.white>
Step.MouseText: Click on the plus sign next to the <modifier.001point>, then click on scores, then <modifier.scorebucket.color.white> You can find <modifier.scorebucket.color.white> in <group.scorebucketmodifiers> It should look like WHEN <sensor.scored><modifier.005points><modifier.001point><modifier.scorebucket.color.white>

value.string: Щелкни по ПЛЮСу справа от <modifier.001point>, затем щелкни по Очки, затем <modifier.scorebucket.color.white> <modifier.scorebucket.color.white> можно найти в группе <group.scorebucketmodifiers> Должно получиться так: Когда <sensor.scored><modifier.scorebucket.color.white><filter.scoreequals><modifier.005points><modifier.001point>

Step.TouchText: Tap on the plus sign next to the <modifier.001point>, then click on scores, then <modifier.scorebucket.color.white> You can find <modifier.scorebucket.color.white> in <group.scorebucketmodifiers> It should look like WHEN <sensor.scored><modifier.005points><modifier.001point><modifier.scorebucket.color.white>

Step.GamepadText:
Perfect!
Now Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> will only follow Kodu<filter.white><kodu> if 6 <filter.fruit> have been collected!
Step.MouseText:
Perfect!
Now Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> will only follow Kodu<filter.white><kodu> if 6 <filter.fruit> have been collected!

value.string:
Идеально!
Теперь Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> должен следовать за Kodu<filter.white><kodu>, если собрано 6 <filter.fruit>!

Step.TouchText:
Perfect!
Now Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu> will only follow Kodu<filter.white><kodu> if 6 <filter.fruit> have been collected!

Step.Comment: Test Run/ break from programming/intro to enemies functionality in game before programming them
Step.GamepadText:
Try and find ONE of the new <filter.fruit> you placed in the scene earlier.
Watch out for enemies!!!
Step.MouseText:
Try and find ONE of the new <filter.fruit> you placed in the scene earlier.
Watch out for enemies!!!

value.string: Попробуй и найди ОДНО из новых <filter.fruit>, которые ты разместил в лабиринте раньше. Следи за врагами!!!

Step.TouchText:
Try and find ONE of the new <filter.fruit> you placed in the scene earlier.
Watch out for enemies!!!

Step.GamepadText:
There are several <filter.terracannon> in the scene and you may have noticed the <filter.terracannon><filter.red> is not working!
Can you find out what's wrong?
Look at other <filter.terracannon> for clues.
Step.MouseText:
There are several <filter.terracannon> in the scene and you may have noticed the <filter.terracannon><filter.red> is not working!
Can you find out what's wrong?
Look at other <filter.terracannon> for clues.

value.string:
В лабиринте расположено несколько <filter.terracannon>, и ты можешь заметить, что <filter.terracannon><filter.red> не работает!
Можешь найти ошибку в программе? Если не сообразишь сам, поищи другие <filter.terracannon> для подсказок.

Step.TouchText:
There are several <filter.terracannon> in the scene and you may have noticed the <filter.terracannon><filter.red> is not working!
Can you find out what's wrong?
Look at other <filter.terracannon> for clues.

Step.GamepadText: We want our <filter.terracannon> detect when <filter.white><kodu> is within <filter.lineofsight> before firing a <modifier.projectile.missile>. Can you see why the Kode is not working properly and fix it?
Step.MouseText: We want our <filter.terracannon> detect when <filter.white><kodu> is within <filter.lineofsight> before firing a <modifier.projectile.missile>. Can you see why the Kode is not working properly and fix it?

value.string: <filter.terracannon> должна стрелять <modifier.projectile.missile>, когда <filter.white><kodu> находится в ее зоне видимости <filter.lineofsight>. Можешь увидеть, почему программа не работает правильно, а потом исправить код, чтобы решить эту проблему?

Step.TouchText: We want our <filter.terracannon> detect when <filter.white><kodu> is within <filter.lineofsight> before firing a <modifier.projectile.missile>. Can you see why the Kode is not working properly and fix it?

Step.GamepadText:
You fixed it! <modifier.expresshappy>
Now this enemy object is behaving properly:
When <filter.white><kodu> is in <filter.lineofsight> of the <filter.terracannon><filter.red> it will fire a <modifier.projectile.missile>
Step.MouseText:
You fixed it! <modifier.expresshappy>
Now this enemy object is behaving properly:
When <filter.white><kodu> is in <filter.lineofsight> of the <filter.terracannon><filter.red> it will fire a <modifier.projectile.missile>

value.string:
Ты все исправил! <modifier.expresshappy>
Теперь этот вражеский объект ведет себя верно:
Когда <filter.white><kodu> в зоне видимости <filter.lineofsight> пушки <filter.terracannon><filter.red>, она начинает стрелять <modifier.projectile.missile>

Step.TouchText:
You fixed it! <modifier.expresshappy>
Now this enemy object is behaving properly:
When <filter.white><kodu> is in <filter.lineofsight> of the <filter.terracannon><filter.red> it will fire a <modifier.projectile.missile>

Step.GamepadText:
Next, let's take a look at the <filter.saucer><filter.red>. This object is not working the way we want it to for our maze.
Bring up it's programming options and let's investigate!
Step.MouseText:
Next, let's take a look at the <filter.saucer><filter.red>. This object is not working the way we want it to for our maze.
Bring up it's programming options and let's investigate!

value.string:
Теперь давай посмотрим на <filter.saucer><filter.red>. Этот объект не работает в нашем лабиринте так, как мы хотим.
Открой ее программу и давай исследовать причину!

Step.TouchText:
Next, let's take a look at the <filter.saucer><filter.red>. This object is not working the way we want it to for our maze.
Bring up it's programming options and let's investigate!

Step.GamepadText: This object should do <filter.003points> <actuator.damage> to the <filter.white><kodu> when they <sensor.bumpers>. Can you see why it's not working and correct it? The <actuator.damage> tile is in the <group.combat> group.
Step.MouseText: This object should do <filter.003points> <actuator.damage> to the <filter.white><kodu> when they <sensor.bumpers>. Can you see why it's not working and correct it? The <actuator.damage> tile is in the <group.combat> group.

value.string: Эта тарелка должна наносить <filter.white><kodu> ущерб <actuator.damage> в <filter.003points> в момент <sensor.bumpers>. Можешь увидеть, почему это не работает, и исправить ситуацию? Объект <actuator.damage> находится в группе <group.combat>.

Step.TouchText: This object should do <filter.003points> <actuator.damage> to the <filter.white><kodu> when they <sensor.bumpers>. Can you see why it's not working and correct it? The <actuator.damage> tile is in the <group.combat> group.

Step.GamepadText: Well done! In this tutorial you: (1) Added 3 more <filter.fruit> to increase the difficulty. (2) Edited Bro-du's<filter.blue><kodu> kode to follow <kodu> once 6 points have been scored<sensor.scored>. (3) Fixed the Kode on the <filter.terracannon> <filter.red> to fire missiles <filter.bullet> when Kodu<filter.bokubot> is in <filter.lineofsight> (4) Fixed the Kode on the <filter.saucer><filter.red>to <actuator.damage> <filter.white><kodu>
Step.MouseText: Well done! In this tutorial you: (1) Added 3 more <filter.fruit> to increase the difficulty. (2) Edited Bro-du's<filter.blue><kodu> kode to follow <kodu> once 6 points have been scored<sensor.scored>. (3) Fixed the Kode on the <filter.terracannon> <filter.red> to fire missiles <filter.bullet> when Kodu<filter.bokubot> is in <filter.lineofsight> (4) Fixed the Kode on the <filter.saucer><filter.red>to <actuator.damage> <filter.white><kodu>

value.string: Отличная работа! В этом уроке ты: (1) Добавил дополнительных 3 <filter.fruit>, чтобы увеличить сложность. (2) Исправил программу Bro-du<filter.blue><kodu>, чтобы он начинал следовать за <kodu>, только когда набрано 6 баллов<sensor.scored>. (3) Исправил программу <filter.terracannon> <filter.red>, чтобы она стреляла ракетами <filter.bullet>, когда Kodu<filter.bokubot> находится в зоне видимости <filter.lineofsight> (4) Исправил программу летающей тарелки <filter.saucer><filter.red>, чтобы при столкновении с <filter.white><kodu> наносить ему <actuator.damage>.

Step.TouchText: Well done! In this tutorial you: (1) Added 3 more <filter.fruit> to increase the difficulty. (2) Edited Bro-du's<filter.blue><kodu> kode to follow <kodu> once 6 points have been scored<sensor.scored>. (3) Fixed the Kode on the <filter.terracannon> <filter.red> to fire missiles <filter.bullet> when Kodu<filter.bokubot> is in <filter.lineofsight> (4) Fixed the Kode on the <filter.saucer><filter.red>to <actuator.damage> <filter.white><kodu>

Step.MouseText: If you're feeling ready for an even greater challenge follow the steps below: (1) Open up the programming options on Kodu. (2) In row 1 click on the <actuator.camera.followme> (3) Click on <group.camera> (4) click <actuator.camera.firstperson> to replace <actuator.camera.followme> Now when you hit play the camera will switch to a first person view on Kodu. Good luck!

value.string: Если ты готов еще сильнее усложнить лабиринт, слелай следующее: :1) Открой программу Kodu. :2) В 1 строке щелкни на <actuator.camera.followme> :3) Щелкни на <group.camera> :4) Щелкни <actuator.camera.firstperson>, чтобы установить новый вид вместо <actuator.camera.followme> Теперь, при запуске игры камера переключится на вид от лица Kodu. Удачи!

Step.GamepadText: After you finish the maze can you try: (1) Editing the <filter.terracannon> and the <filter.saucer> to behave differently? (2) Making an entirely new enemy?
Step.MouseText: After you finish the maze can you try: (1) Editing the <filter.terracannon> and the <filter.saucer> to behave differently? (2) Making an entirely new enemy?

value.string: После прохождения лабиринта ты можешь попробовать: (1) Отредактировать программы <filter.terracannon> и <filter.saucer>, чтобы они вели себя по-разному. (2) Добавить и запрограммировать совершенно нового врага.

Step.TouchText: After you finish the maze can you try: (1) Editing the <filter.terracannon> and the <filter.saucer> to behave differently? (2) Making an entirely new enemy?

Step.GamepadText: Look in the maze for 6 <filter.fruit>
Step.MouseText: Look in the maze for 6 <filter.fruit>
Step.TouchText: Look in the maze for 6 <filter.fruit>

Step.GamepadText: Find Bro-du and lead him home<filter.hut>!
Step.MouseText: Find Bro-du and lead him home<filter.hut>!

value.string: Найди Bro-du и отведи его домой в <filter.hut>!

Step.TouchText: Find Bro-du and lead him home<filter.hut>!

Step.GamepadText: Watch out for enemies<filter.terracannon><filter.saucer>!
Step.MouseText: Watch out for enemies<filter.terracannon><filter.saucer>!
Step.TouchText: Watch out for enemies<filter.terracannon><filter.saucer>!
